contentList.content: You gain a +5 bonus to Initiative and can't be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SURPRISED">Surprised</LSTag>. You gain <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> in <LSTag Tooltip="Perception">Perception</LSTag>.

You gained a +[1] bonus to Initiative and can't be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SURPRISED">Surprised</LSTag>. You gained <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> in <LSTag Tooltip="Perception">Perception</LSTag>.
Archery Expert

Your <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> increases by 1. You gain additional benefits based on what type of ranged weapon you are wielding. You need to be proficient with the weapon to receive this benefit.
Archery Expert: Bows
Allows your attacks made with short- and longbows to ricochet to two additional targets. All targets take half damage. This can be toggled on and off.
Archery Expert: Crossbows

When wielding light or heavy crossbows you can make a <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="SYR_Projectile_ArcheryExpert_BonusShot">Bonus Shot</LSTag> using a <LSTag Type="Image" Info="TutorialBonusActionFilter"/> <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">bonus action</LSTag> and you can make a close range <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="SYR_Projectile_ArcheryExpert_RepellingShot">Repelling Shot</LSTag>.
Archery Expert: Hand Crossbows
When you make hand crossbow attacks within melee range, the <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> do not have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag>.
Ricochet Shot
Make a ranged attack with your equipped weapon and let the arrow ricochet to two nearby targets. All targets take half damage.
Bonus Shot

Make a ranged attack with your equipped weapon using a <LSTag Type="Image" Info="TutorialBonusActionFilter"/> <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">bonus action</LSTag> which deals half damage.
Repelling Shot

Push your target back [1] and on a failed <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> knock it <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>. This attack deals half your weapon damage.

You can increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> by 1 and gain <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Rush_Charger_Attack">Charger: Weapon Attack</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Rush_Charger_Push">Charger: Shove</LSTag>.

Your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> increased by 1 and you gained <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Rush_Charger_Attack">Charger: Weapon Attack</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Rush_Charger_Push">Charger: Shove</LSTag>
Charge forward and slam your weapon into the first enemy in your way without provoking <LSTag Tooltip="OpportunityAttack">Opportunity Attacks</LSTag>, dealing an additional [1].

Charge forward and shove the first enemy in your way without provoking <LSTag Tooltip="OpportunityAttack">Opportunity Attacks</LSTag>. Your chances depend on your <LSTag Tooltip="Athletics">Athletics</LSTag>, and you gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> if you are hidden or invisible.

Increases your <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> by +1 and when attacked while wielding a <LSTag Tooltip="Finesse">Finesse Weapon</LSTag> you're <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficient</LSTag> with, you can use a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">reaction</LSTag> to add your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> to your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag>, possibly causing the attack to miss.

Your <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> is increased by +1 and when attacked while wielding a <LSTag Tooltip="Finesse">Finesse Weapon</LSTag> you're <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficient</LSTag> with, you can use a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">reaction</LSTag> to add your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> to your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag>, possibly causing the attack to miss.

You can use Two-Weapon Fighting even if your weapons aren't Light, and you gain a +1 bonus to Armour Class while wielding a melee weapon in each hand. You cannot dual-wield Heavy weapons.

Additionally increase one of your abilities by 1.

You gain Advantage on Perception Checks and on Dexterity Saving Throws outside of combat.

Additionally you gain Proficiency in Dexterity Saving Throws and your Dexterity increases by 1.

Your Constitution increases by 1, to a maximum of 20 and in combat, if you are below 75% hit points, regain 1 + your Constitution Modifier.

You regain full hit points each time you take a Short Rest.

In combat, if you are below 75% <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag>, regain 1 + your <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag> - increased to 1d4 + your <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag> at level 5. You regain full <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag> when you <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag>. Your <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> score is increased by 1, to a maximum of 20.
Resistance
Resistant to Bludgeoning Damage
Resistant to Slashing Damage
Resistant to Piercing Damage
Elemental Adept
Select an element to become adept in.

You gain <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourProficiency">Armour Proficiency</LSTag> with Light Armour, your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> increases by 1, to a maximum of 20 and your <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> increases by 1.
You have <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourProficiency">Armour Proficiency</LSTag> with Light Armour and your <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> is increased by +1.

Add half of your Proficiency Bonus to the Saving Throw against spells. If you are in melee range you also have Advantage on the Saving Throw.

You can use a reaction to immediately make attack against the caster if you are within melee range.

Enemies you hit have Disadvantage on Concentration Saving Throws.

Add half of your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> to the <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> against spells. If you are in melee range you also have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on the <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>.
You can use a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">reaction</LSTag> to make an attack against an enemy after it casts a spell within melee range of you.

You learn 2 <LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">cantrips</LSTag> and a Level 1 spell from the bard spell list. You can cast the Level 1 spell once per <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag>. Your <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> is set to 13, unless it is already higher.

You have learnt 2 <LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">cantrips</LSTag> and a Level 1 spell from the bard spell list. <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> increased to 13. Has no effect if your <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> is higher than 13.

You learn 2 <LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">cantrips</LSTag> and a Level 1 spell from the cleric spell list. You can cast the Level 1 spell once per <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag>. Your <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> is set to 13, unless it is already higher.

You have learnt 2 <LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">cantrips</LSTag> and a Level 1 spell from the cleric spell list. <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> increased to 13. Has no effect if your <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> is higher than 13.

You learn 2 <LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">cantrips</LSTag> and a Level 1 spell from the druid spell list. You can cast the Level 1 spell once per <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag> Your <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> is set to 13, unless it is already higher.

You have learnt 2 <LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">cantrips</LSTag> and a Level 1 spell from the druid spell list. <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> increased to 13. Has no effect if your <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> is higher than 13.

You learn 2 <LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">cantrips</LSTag> and a Level 1 spell from the sorcerer spell list. You can cast the Level 1 spell once per <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag>. Your <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> is set to 13, unless it is already higher.

You have learnt 2 <LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">cantrips</LSTag> and a Level 1 spell from the sorcerer spell list. <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> increased to 13. Has no effect if your <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> is higher than 13.

You learn 2 <LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">cantrips</LSTag> and a Level 1 spell from the warlock spell list. You can cast the Level 1 spell once per <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag>. Your <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> is set to 13, unless it is already higher.

You have learnt 2 <LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">cantrips</LSTag> and a Level 1 spell from the warlock spell list. <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> increased to 13. Has no effect if your <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> is higher than 13.

You learn 2 <LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">cantrips</LSTag> and a Level 1 spell from the wizard spell list. You can cast the Level 1 spell once per <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag>. Your <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag> is set to 13, unless it is already higher.

You have learnt 2 <LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">cantrips</LSTag> and a Level 1 spell from the wizard spell list. <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag> increased to 13. Has no effect if your <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag> is higher than 13.
You can cast the Level 1 spell once per <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag>. All 3 spells use your <LSTag Tooltip="SpellcastingAbility">Spellcasting Ability</LSTag>.

You learn two manoeuvres from the Battle Master subclass and gain two Superiority Die to fuel them or one additional Superiority Die if you already have any.

You regain expended Superiority Dice after a Short or Long Rest.
You receive 2 superiority die or 1 additional superiority die.
Maneuvers
Select maneuvers to learn.

Medium Armour doesn't impose Disadvantage on Stealth Checks and it causes you to take 1 less damage from all sources. The bonus to Armour Class you can gain from your Dexterity Modifier becomes +3 instead of +2.

You also gain +1 to initiative and can increase Strength or Dexterity by 1.

Medium Armour doesn't impose Disadvantage on Stealth Checks and it causes you to take 1 less damage from all sources. The bonus to Armour Class you can gain from your Dexterity Modifier becomes +[1] instead of +[2].

Your initiative is increased by +[3] and your Strength or Dexterity increased by +[4].
Mobile: Speed

Your movement speed and Dexterity increases, and difficult terrain doesn't slow you down when you Dash. After using an Action to Dash you can make an Extra Attack.

If you move after making a melee attack, you don't provoke Opportunity Attacks from your target.

Your <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> increases by [1] and your <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> increases by [2]. After using an <LSTag Type="Image" Info="TutorialActionFilter"/> <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ActionPoint">Action</LSTag> to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Dash">Dash</LSTag> you can make an <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="ExtraAttack">Extra Attack</LSTag>.

You gain Musical Instrument Proficiency,Proficiency in Performance and your Charisma increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.

At the start of battle you play a random song, inspiring your allies or demoralizing your enemies. This can happen once per Short or Long Rest.

The possible songs are:
Inspiring Ballad
Commanding March
Demoralizing Song
Lullaby

You know how to play musical instruments and gained Proficiency in Performance.

At the start of battle you play a random song, inspiring your allies or demoralizing your enemies. This can happen once per Short or Long Rest.
Inspiring Ballad

Inspire your allies with a song. They gain <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">temporary hit points</LSTag> and one use of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BARDIC_INSPIRATION">Bardic Inspiration</LSTag>, lasting [1] turns.
Commanding March

Command your allies to battle with a song. Their first attack gains <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> and they are granted an additional [2] <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> for [1] turns.
Granted an additional [1] <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag>.
Demoralizing Song

Mock your enemies with a demoralizing song. If they fail a <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> they are <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BANE">Baned</LSTag> for [1] turns.
Lullaby

Sing your enemies to sleep with a lullaby. If they fail a <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> they become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SYR_PERFORMER_LULLABY_DROWSY">Drowsy</LSTag> for [1] turns.
Drowsy

<LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> reduced by [1] and can't use <LSTag Type="Image" Info="TutorialBonusActionFilter"/> <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">bonus actions</LSTag>.

When attacking with a glaive, halberd, pike, quarterstaff, trident or spear, you can use a bonus action to attack with the butt of your weapon.

You can also make an Opportunity Attack when a target comes within range.
When wielding a glaive, halberd, pike, quarterstaff, trident or spear, you can make an <LSTag Tooltip="OpportunityAttack">Opportunity Attack</LSTag> when a target comes within range.
Prerequisite: Must be wielding a glaive, halberd, pike, quarterstaff, trident or spear.
When attacking with a glaive, halberd, pike, quarterstaff, trident or spear, you can use a bonus action to attack with the butt of your weapon and deal [1].
Proficiency
Select an ability to gain <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> in its <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.

Learn <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_DisguiseSelf">Disguise Self</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Jump">Enhanced Jump</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_FeatherFall">Feather Fall</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_FindFamiliar">Find Familiar</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Longstrider">Longstrider</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_DetectThoughts">Detect Thoughts</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_SpeakWithAnimals">Speak With Animals</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_SpeakWithDead">Speak With Dead</LSTag> and the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Guidance">Guidance</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Light">Light</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Resistance">Resistance</LSTag> cantrips. Additionally you can select an ability to gain basic training in.

You have learnt several <LSTag Tooltip="RitualSpell">ritual spells</LSTag> and the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Guidance">Guidance</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Light">Light</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Resistance">Resistance</LSTag> cantrips. Additionally you gained a minimum of 13 in a chosen ability.
Ritual Spells

Cast <LSTag Tooltip="RitualSpell">ritual spells</LSTag> or the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Guidance">Guidance</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Light">Light</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Resistance">Resistance</LSTag> cantrips.

While wearing a shield your <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> are improved and you can use an improved <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_ShieldBlow_Riposte">Shield Bash</LSTag> with any shield.
Shield Master: Shield Bash

While you are wielding a shield, you can use Shield Bash against enemies entering melee range as well as enemies who hit you with a melee attack.

Additionally Shield Bash deals [1] and if used against an enemy entering melee range it does not cost a reaction.
Shield Bash
Bash your shield against a target and possibly knock it <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.

When an enemy enters melee range, you can <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_ShieldBlow_Riposte">Shield Bash</LSTag> them, knocking them <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag> unless they succeed a <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>. This does not cost a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">reaction</LSTag> but can only be used once a turn.
Shield Riposte

When struck by a melee attack, riposte against your attacker with your shield, knocking them Prone unless they succeed a Strength Saving Throw.

If you have Shield Master deal [1].

When struck by a melee attack, you can riposte against your attacker with your shield, knocking them Prone unless they succeed a Strength Saving Throw.

If you have Shield Master deal [1].

When struck by a melee attack, riposte against your attacker with the walking fortress, dealing [1] and knocking them Prone unless they succeed a Strength Saving Throw.

If you have Shield Master deal [2] instead.

When struck by a melee attack, you can riposte against your attacker with the walking fortress, dealing [1] and knocking them Prone unless they succeed a Strength Saving Throw.

If you have Shield Master deal [2] instead.
Shield Master: Saving Throws
You gain <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> in 3 <LSTag Tooltip="Skill">Skills</LSTag> of your choice and can select an ability to gain basic training in.
You have gained <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> in 3 <LSTag Tooltip="Skill">Skills</LSTag> of your choice and you gained a minimum of 13 in a chosen ability.
Proficiency

Select a skill to gain <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> in, adding your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> to <LSTag Tooltip="SkillCheck">Skill Checks</LSTag>.

Your spells gain +3m/10ft range, halved for melee spells (not reflected in the tooltip). You learn a cantrip and the number you need to roll a Critical Hit with spells is reduced by 1. This effect can stack.

Your spells gain +3m/10ft range, halved for melee spells (not reflected in the tooltip). The number you need to roll a Critical Hit while attacking with a spell is reduced by 1. This effect can stack.
Your hit point maximum increases by 2 for every level you have gained and you take 2 less damage from all sources.
You take 2 less damage from all sources.

You gain <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> with four weapons of your choice, and your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> increases by 1.

You have gained <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> with four weapons of your choice and your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> increased by 1.
Weapon Proficiencies
Select weapon types to gain <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> in.
Basic Strength
<LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> increased to 13. Has no effect if your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> is higher than 13.
Basic Dexterity
<LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> increased to 13. Has no effect if your <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> is higher than 13.
Basic Constitution
<LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> increased to 13. Has no effect if your <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> is higher than 13.
Basic Intelligence
<LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag> increased to 13. Has no effect if your <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag> is higher than 13.
Basic Wisdom
<LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> increased to 13. Has no effect if your <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> is higher than 13.
Basic Charisma
<LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> increased to 13. Has no effect if your <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> is higher than 13.
Basic Ability Training

Increase an ability to 13, has no effect if it
is higher than 13.
